content: Hi all - I am getting a timeout when buiding an IG blocking my CI build; is this the right channel? Looking for any advice if this is avoidable or do I need to raise a ticket somewhere? Output at http://build.fhir.org/ig/aehrc/primary-care-data-technical/branches/master/failure/build.log
how long does it take to run things locally?
hi - locally it is hanging indefinitely after "Validating Conformance Resources " same as logs
if you can turn logging up, you might be able to narrow things down
Worked out issue related to a specific profile; will try and work out what the exact content is that causes the issue.
